document.topic_text: {{media}} Enemies of Reason is a series of British television shows on Channel 4, some hosted by [[Richard Dawkins]]. In it, he attempts to assault the modern denigration of [[science]] and [[evidence-based medicine]] for the thinking viewer. Enemies of Reason is a series of British television shows on Channel 4, some hosted by [[Richard Dawkins]]. In it, he attempts to assault the modern denigration of [[science]] and [[evidence-based medicine]] for the thinking viewer. Latest revision as of 05:31, 12 August 2016 You gotta spin it to win it
